context.title: Artifact Editor
context.description: The Artifact Editor provides specialized features for editing artifacts (this is the default editor for editing attributes and relations).

context.title: Artifact Editor - Attributes
context.description: The attributes area allows for editing and viewing of attribute values contained by the artifact being edited.

context.title: Artifact Editor - Relations
context.description: The relations area allows for editing and viewing of artifacts related to the artifact being edited.

context.title: Artifact Editor - Details
context.description: The details area displays artifact metadata such as guid, version, branch etc...

context.title: Artifact Explorer
context.description: Shows the artifact hierarchy of the selected branch for navigation.

context.title: Artifact Search
context.description: The advanced artifact search allows users to create custom searches.

context.title: Branch Manager
context.description: Shows all branches and transactions on each branch managed by OSEE in a hierarchical fashion.

context.title: Blam Editor
context.description: The BLAM (BLAM Lightweight Artifact Manipulation) Editor allows non-programmers to graphically construct workflows to automate repetitive tasks.

context.title: Resource History View
context.description: Shows a detailed view of the changes made to an artifact over time.

context.title: Mass Artifact Editor
context.description: The Mass Artifact Editor allows the easy view and editing of multiple artifacts.

context.title: Artifact Merge Manager
context.description: The Merge Manager allows users to resolve artifact conflicts detected during branch commits.

context.title: Quick Search
context.description: The Quick Search view allows users to perform searches for information contained by artifact attributes in a selected branch.

context.title: Quick Search - Attribute Type Filter Option
context.description: Search for artifacts by searching specific attribute types for work matches on the selected branch.

context.title: Quick Search - By Id Option
context.description: Search for artifacts with a particular GUID on the selected branch.

context.title: Quick Search - Include Deleted Option
context.description: Include deleted artifacts in the search.

context.title: Quick Search - Match Word Order Option
context.description: Match the phrase instead of the existence of words in the search.

context.title: Quick Search - Exact Match Option
context.description: Match the phrase exactly as entered in the search.

context.title: Quick Search - Match Case Sensitive Option
context.description: During a word order match, makes the search for the phrase case sensitive.

context.title: Sky Walker View
context.description: Displays a graphical representation of artifacts and their relations for navigation.

context.title: Test Run View
context.description: The Test Run View provides an integration point with OTE (OSEE Test Environment).

context.title: Change Report Editor
context.description: Shows all changes made to a branch.

context.title: XViewer - Table Customizations
context.description: Allows the table to be customized, saved and loaded.

context.title: XViewer - Results View
context.description: Show reports, errors, metrics and other data in a multi-paged view with print, email and exporting capabilities.
